snippet.title: The Sims 3 Seasons- Announce Trailer
snippet.description: Seasons are coming to your Sims' world. Now your Sims can swim in the ocean on a hot summer day, bob for apples among the autumn leaves, test their snowboarding skill on the half pipe, or welcome spring with a colorful umbrella and a walk in the rain! From all-new activities like soccer to unique seasonal festivals, your Sims can find all-new ways to play with the ever-changing experiences of The Sims 3 Seasons! Available November 13, 2012. Visit http://thesims.com/seasons to learn more and pre-order now to receive the Limited Edition version, featuring the exclusive Ice Lounge community lot.
